entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:40 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
